input.sentences: i was up late last night and i decided to hang out with my son .
he was very excited to spend some time with me .

we stopped at a nearby pond in the morning .
we spent a few hours there chatting .
output.sentences: I man stood alone i n the dark.
A child sat alone in his room and thought about his father.
A man drove alone in the very early morning so that he could earn a living to support his son.
